attributes.action: Against pay permile and speed limiters as they are a infringement of rights
attributes.additional_details: Get rid off the pay permile tarkers and speed limiters as they are dangerous also is a from of spying on us and a infringement of our human rights
attributes.background:
Charger EVs by sizes on yearly road tax 
Say £75 for small ones
£150 for mid size 
And £200 for mpvs and 4x4 EVs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for Government not to require ISA speed limiters on new UK cars: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598939

The Government hasn't introduced pay-per mile taxes for motor vehicles, but we could accept a petition calling on the Government to commit not to introduce road pricing along these lines, if that's something you'd like to happen.

We can't publish petitions that make false or unproven claims, which includes unsubstantiated assertions that certain policies breach human rights or are dangerous.
